abstract: Rwanda’s Senate clears way for referendum on allowing Pres Paul Kagame to seek third term, move which alarms United States State Dept.
lead_paragraph: President Paul Kagame, in power since 2000, has won widespread praise for rebuilding the country since a 1994 genocide killed about 800,000 people.

headline.main: Rwanda: Lawmakers Clear Referendum on Letting President Seek a Third Term
headline.print_headline: Africa; Rwanda: Lawmakers Clear Referendum on Letting President Seek a Third Term

snippet: President Paul Kagame, in power since 2000, has won widespread praise for rebuilding the country since a 1994 genocide killed about 800,000 people.
